display_name: Epworth Sleepiness Scale: Chance of dozing as a passenger in a car for an hour without a break
description:
Item from the Epworth Sleepiness Scale [Johns MW 1991 (PubMed ID: 1798888)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/1798888)
